speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: SCENE X. Another part of the plain.

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: CANIDIUS marcheth with his land army one way over  the stage; and TAURUS, the lieutenant of OCTAVIUS  CAESAR, the other way. After their going in, is heard the noise of a sea-fight

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Alarum. Enter DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Naught, naught all, naught! I can behold no longer:

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: The Antoniad, the Egyptian admiral,

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: With all their sixty, fly and turn the rudder:

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: To see't mine eyes are blasted.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Enter SCARUS

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Gods and goddesses,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: All the whole synod of them!

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: What's thy passion!

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: The greater cantle of the world is lost

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: With very ignorance; we have kiss'd away

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Kingdoms and provinces.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: How appears the fight?

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: On our side like the token'd pestilence,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Where death is sure. Yon ribaudred nag of Egypt,--

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Whom leprosy o'ertake!--i' the midst o' the fight,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: When vantage like a pair of twins appear'd,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Both as the same, or rather ours the elder,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: The breese upon her, like a cow in June,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Hoists sails and flies.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: That I beheld:

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Mine eyes did sicken at the sight, and could not

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Endure a further view.

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: She once being loof'd,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: The noble ruin of her magic, Antony,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Claps on his sea-wing, and, like a doting mallard,

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Leaving the fight in height, flies after her:

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: I never saw an action of such shame;

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Experience, manhood, honour, ne'er before

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: Did violate so itself.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Alack, alack!

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Enter CANIDIUS

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: Our fortune on the sea is out of breath,

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: And sinks most lamentably. Had our general

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: Been what he knew himself, it had gone well:

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: O, he has given example for our flight,

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: Most grossly, by his own!

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Ay, are you thereabouts?

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Why, then, good night indeed.

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: Toward Peloponnesus are they fled.

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: 'Tis easy to't; and there I will attend

speaker: SCARUS
text_entry: What further comes.

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: To Caesar will I render

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: My legions and my horse: six kings already

speaker: CANIDIUS
text_entry: Show me the way of yielding.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: I'll yet follow

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: The wounded chance of Antony, though my reason

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Sits in the wind against me.

speaker: DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS
text_entry: Exeunt
